name: Jumping in the Dark
description:
My first submission for a game a week.
Jumping in the Dark is a simple Puzzle Platformer. You control a member of a Hive Mind as they make their way through obstacles in order to escape.

Controls:

Space or W to jump

E to Begin Moving

Q to Turn the player character's direction

R to leave your existing body for another one.

Added a Level Select button to ensure that anyone can see all of the levels.

If you enjoyed the game or have any feedback please let me know.  If you are interested in how this game was developed please check out my Blog where I break down all the design decisions that went into the game.

If you would like to check out the very uncommented Blueprints they are linked below.

https://github.com/TrapTart/Death_is_Useful_Code
